title: Bloomberg Markets: Widenor on Irma's Impact on Citrus
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Widenor on Irma's Impact on Citrus
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joel Widenor Co-Founder and Director of Agriculture Services Commodity Weather Group Discussing impact of Hurricane Irma on crops, as the strom's revised track increases threat to Florida citru and sugarcane.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
